articles.author: Nick Taylor-Vaisey, Anna Wiederkehr
articles.title: Canadians kind of hate America now. Our new poll shows just how much. - Politico
articles.description: It’s not just about the trade war. Nearly half of America’s neighbors to the north now think the U.S. is a bigger threat to world peace than Russia.
articles.content: Any prolonged Canada-U.S. tension feels deeply personal to many border-town residents. The rivers and lakes and straight-line boundaries that divide the two countries were for decades just technicali… [+1673 chars]

articles.author: Barak Ravid
articles.title: Trump meets with top Iran advisers as war threat grows - Axios
articles.description: The Trump administration is closer to a major war in the Middle East than most Americans realize.
articles.content: <ul><li>A U.S. military operation in Iran would likely be a massive, weeks-long campaign that would look more like full-fledged war than last month's pinpoint operation in Venezuela, sources say.</li… [+1701 chars]

articles.title: Jordan Stolz pursues 1500m gold, sprint sweep as speed skating continues in Milan - NBC Olympics
articles.description: With a win in the 1500m Thursday, Jordan Stolz could become just the second American to take gold thrice at a single Winter Games.
articles.content:
They say good things come in threes.
It's a common superstition: If two good things happen in rapid succession, a third is sure to follow. On Thursday, 21-year-old speed skater Jordan Stolz will loo… [+2125 chars]

articles.title: Jesse Jackson Knew Better Than to Forget - The Ringer
articles.description: The civil rights icon always held America to account—and never stopped fighting to preserve what he knew could be taken away
